attributes.action: Get Neil Doncaster out of cheating the Scottish game
attributes.additional_details: Get the Chief Executive of the SFA out of Scottish football, after the saga with Glasgow Rangers and HMRC , this previously failed football director has tried to bully clubs into allowing a newco in the SPL with no sanctions, bullying the Scottish Football League clubs that if they dont allow Rangers into a first division then there will be sanctions brought on them as them being de-moted to the third division like all other clubs previously to go into liquidation have had to endure is "not viable" He is a cheat.
